ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It's good to the knowledge structure to take this course. It's difficult, but useful.
I would recommend this course to a fellow student. This course helps one to a get a broader picture of macroscopic systems and their description using statistical mechanics.
It is a great course, with great applications for students working in Physics and Geophysics.
Yes. To understand thermodynamics it is the best course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: How could someone resist stat thermodynamics?
Compared to dynamics, this course provides a new approach to analysis the problem in research.
This has been a very important course for the research I propose to do, as it explains the statistical aspects of the system quite well.
I understand thermodynamics better now after taking this course.
